Game.Name: Disney's The Wild
Game.Plot: The Wild is an single-player, side-scrolling adventure game starring zoo animals trying to get back to the wild. Players to take on the role of Samson and Benny through 18 levels of action, as they journey from the New York City zoo to the wilds in search of Ryan, Samson's lost teenage son. Lava-spewing volcanoes, falling stalactites, angry dogs, charging wildebeests and other obstacles are waiting for you to overcome them! FEATURES: Pump up the Boost Meter and your animal powers increase! Unique BVG Shadow Training hones your game play skills Includes your friends Bridget the Giraffe, Larry the Snake and Nigel the Koala More than 40 unlockable film photos
